title: T206 Hall of Famers for Sale
author: barrysloate

posts.post_title: T206 Hall of Famers for Sale
posts.post_content:
T206 Frank Chance (red portrait) SGC 60 PD 350 - toughest of the three Chance poses. Sharp, well centered, bright colors, well deserved Excellent condition...SOLD

T206 Walter Johnson (portrait) PSA 2 PD 150- Key HOFer, well centered, bright colors, light horizontal wrinkle above head, a few other tiny flaws, a very respectable Good Condition. I've seen VG's worse than this one...SOLD

T206 Addie Joss (portrait) SGC 60 PD 350- Superb eye appeal, bright colors, well centered. Strong Excellent condition...$595

T206 Nap Lajoie (portrait) PSA 4 PD 150- Another beautiful card, bright colors and well centered, with a light vertical scratch below the "V", VG-EX condition...SOLD

T206 Christy Mathewson (black cap) SGC 55 PD 350- A stunning card in every way, with sharp corners, great colors, and near perfect centering. Why this isn't in at least a 5 holder is a mystery to me. VG-EX+...$1350

First one to say "I'll take it" takes it. Check, money order, or paypal accepted. Will ship either registered mail or first class insured, depending on value, at my expense. Please PM or email at [url]bsloate@verizon.net[/url] if interested. Thank you.
Email sent requesting some larger scans. Thank you, Barry.
PM sent on Joss and Lajoie.

After only 24 hours, these have already gotten a small price reduction. And there will be more until everything sells, or until I can't reduce them anymore. I'm a motivated seller, within reason of course. Plus, it gives me a lame excuse to bump this to the top again.

If you're a serious T206 collector, please keep your eye on these. In fact, don't even leave the house lest you miss something. Thanks guys.
Bump for final price reduction. Only Joss and Matty left.
